article.headline: UNLV 83, Brigham Young 75
article.story: LAS VEGAS (AP) -- Wink Adams scored 27 points and Wendell White had 21 points and 10 rebounds Saturday night as UNLV snapped BYU's seven game winning streak with an 83-75 victory. UNLV (15-4, 2-2 Mountain West Conference) trailed by five early in the second half before going on an 18-6 run to take a 54-47 lead with 11:45 to play. White had five points in the outburst and Curtis Terry added a 3-pointer. Adams scored 19 points in the second half, capped by a layup with 3:25 to play that gave the Rebels their biggest lead of the game, 72-56. Adams also helped the Rebels rally from a double-digit deficit in the first half, hitting a 3-pointer with 41 seconds left for a 36-34 lead. UNLV scored 11 of the half's last 13 points. Gaston Essengue and Corey Bailey had 10 points apiece for the Rebels, who improved to 10-1 at home. BYU (12-5, 2-1) led by as many as 11 points, using a 3-pointer from Lee Cummard to take its biggest lead of the game, 25-14 with 7:37 to play in the first half. Cummard led the Cougars with 18 points, Keena Young added 16 and Trent Plaisted added 13.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
